name: PayonePayment

infos.name: PAYONE Payment für Shopware 6
infos.description:
Payment für Ihren Shopware 6-Shop

Sie suchen nach der optimalen Payment-Lösung für Ihren Online-Shop?
Wir bieten Ihnen Komplettlösungen für Zahlungen im stationären Handel, E-Commerce und Mobile Commerce sowie im Selbstzahlerbereich. Unsere zusätzlichen Serviceleistungen für eine ganzheitliche Zahlungsabwicklung vervollständigen das Angebot und steigern Ihre Sicherheit, Erträge und den Service für Ihre Kunden.

Payment mit PAYONE überzeugt

Eine Lösung, ein Partner, ein Vertrag

Einfach & effizient. Technische Abwicklung und Finanzdienstleistungen aus einer Hand.

Internationale Zahlungsabwicklung

Zugang zu internationalen und lokalen Zahlungsarten on demand.

Automatisches Debitorenmanagement

Effektive Entlastung der Buchhaltung durch Transaktionszuordnung und Kontenabgleich.

Beste Referenzen, langjährige Erfahrung

Ausgewiesene Experten. Persönlicher Kundenservice. Bei jedem E-Commerce-Projekt.

Vorteile & Funktionen des Payment-Plugin

  • Enthält die beliebtesten Zahlarten wie Kreditkarte, Klarna und PayPal
  • Unterstützt individuelle Verkaufskanäle
  • Gutschriften und Buchungen direkt aus dem Shopware Backend
  • Dynamisches Zahlstatusmapping zum Shopware Status
  • Automatische Synchronisation mit PAYONE
  • Alle SEPA Funktionalitäten inkl. Mandatsverwaltung verfügbar
  • Unterstützt vereinfachte PCI DSS Konformität nach SAQ A
  • Kostenlose Bereitstellung als Open Source Plugin

Unser GitHub Repository für Shopware

https://github.com/PAYONE-GmbH/shopware-6

Kontakt & Support

Bei  Fragen oder Feedback stehen Ihnen unsere Experten von PAYONE gern zur Verfügung.
Sie erreichen uns Mo - Fr 9:00 - 18:00 Uhr.

PAYONE Technical Support
Phone +49 431 25968-500
tech.support@payone.com

PAYONE Sales
Phone +49 431 25968-400
sales@payone.com
infos.installationManual:
Die Installation und Konfiguration unseres Plugins beschreiben wir ausführlich in unserer Online Dokumentation:

https://docs.payone.com/display/public/INT/Shopware+6+Plugin
infos.shortDescription: Die optimale Payment-Lösung für Ihren Shopware 6-Shop. Alle gängigen Zahlarten, automatische Synchronisation mit PAYONE Zahlstatus, vereinfachte PCI DSS Konformität nach SAQ A
infos.highlights:
Die beliebtesten Zahlarten in einem Plugin
automatische Kreditkartentyperkennung
kostenloser Support
infos.features:
Kreditkarten (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, JCB, Diners, Maestro International)
Wallets (Alipay, Apple Pay, paydirekt, PayPal, PayPal Express, WeChat Pay)
Überweisungszahlarten (PAYONE Lastschrift, PAYONE Vorkasse, PAYONE Rechnungskauf)
Online Bank Überweisungen (Bancontact, EPS, iDEAL, Postfinance Card, Postfinance E-Finance, Przelewy24, Sofort, Trustly) 
Financing (PAYONE gesicherter Rechnungskauf, PAYONE gesicherter Ratenkauf, PAYONE gesicherte Lastschrift in 14 Tagen, Klarna Rechnung, Klarna Lastschrift, Klarna Ratenkauf, Ratepay Rechnung, Ratepay Lastschrift, Ratepay Ratenkauf, Unzer Lastschrift, Unzer Rechnungskauf, Unzer Ratenkauf)

infos.name: PAYONE Payment for Shopware
infos.description:
Payment for your Shopware 6-Shop

Are you looking for the optimal payment solution for your online store?

We offer you complete solutions for payments in stationary commerce, e-commerce and mobile commerce as well as in the self-pay sector. Our additional services for holistic payment processing complete the offering and increase your security, revenue and service for your customers.

Payment with PAYONE convinces

One solution, one partner, one contract

Simple & efficient. Technical processing and financial services from a single source.

International payment processing

Access to international and local payment methods on demand.

Automatic accounts receivable management

Effective relief for accounting through transaction allocation and account reconciliation.

Best references, many years of experience

Proven experts. Personal customer service. For every e-commerce project.

Payment plugin advantages & functions

  • Includes the most popular payment methods such as Credit Card, Klarna and PayPal
  • Supports individual sales channels
  • Credit notes and bookings directly from the Shopware backend
  • Dynamic payment status mapping to Shopware status
  • Automatic synchronization with PAYONE
  • All SEPA functionalities incl. mandate management available
  • Supports simplified PCI DSS compliance according to SAQ A
  • Free deployment as open source plugin

Our GitHub repository for Shopware

https://github.com/PAYONE-GmbH/shopware-6

Contact & Support

If you have any questions or feedback, our experts at PAYONE will be happy to help.
You can reach us Mon - Fri 9:00 - 18:00.

PAYONE Technical Support
Phone +49 431 25968-500
tech.support@payone.com

PAYONE Sales
Phone +49 431 25968-400
sales@payone.com
infos.installationManual:
The installation and configuration of our plugin is described in detail in our online documentation:

https://docs.payone.com/display/public/INT/Shopware+6+Plugin#
infos.shortDescription: The optimal payment solution for your shopware shop. All common payment methods, automatic synchronization with PAYONE payment status, simplified PCI DSS compliance to SAQ A
infos.highlights:
The most popular payment methods in one plugin
automatic credit card type recognition
free support
infos.features:
Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, JCB, Diners, Maestro International)
Wallets (Alipay, Apple Pay, paydirekt, PayPal, PayPal Express, WeChat Pay)
Wire Transfer (PAYONE Direct Debit, PAYONE Invoice, PAYONE Prepayment)
Online Bank Transfer (Bancontact, EPS, iDEAL, Postfinance Card, Postfinance E-Finance, Przelewy24, Sofort, Trustly) 
Financing (PAYONE Secured Invoice, PAYONE Secured Installment, PAYONE Secured Direct Debit, Klarna Pay Later, Klarna Pay Now, Klarna Slice It, Ratepay Open Invoice, Ratepay Direct Debit, Ratepay Installments, Unzer Lastschrift, Unzer Rechnungskauf, Unzer Ratenkauf)

comments.text: Ich hatte ständig Probleme. Die Abwicklung über Payone ist sehr schwierig und aufwändig. Obwohl ich noch mehrere Monate bezahlen muss (langfristige Verträge!), habe ich diese Bezahlmethode wieder entfernt.
comments.headline: nicht zu empfehlen

comments.text:
Wie kann es sein, dass so ein wichtiges Plugin (man beachte, es ist ein Zahlungsanbieter!!!!) nicht für eine Shopware-Version 6.4.2 kompatibel ist, die seit 07.07. released ist? Das sind 1,5 Monate! Wie kann man sich das erlauben? Wir sitzen jetzt auf einer Shopware-Version, die wir nicht updaten können weil ihr mit eurem Plugin nicht hinterherkommt.

Noch dazu haben wir eine Pluginversion installiert, die offenbar gar nicht released werden sollte! Wir kommen uns verar*** und im Stich gelassen vor!
comments.headline: Frechheit! Es gibt keine Updates!

comments.text: Nachdem lange keine Updates gekommen sind läuft es jetzt wieder besser. Im Moment sind wir zufrieden und auch der Support meldet sich bei Anfragen schnell zurück
comments.headline: Mittlerweile Updates - Deutliche Verbesserung

comments.text:
Laut Store und Plugin-Manager ist das Plugin kompatibel für 6.4.2.x
Nach dem Shopware Update auf 6.4.2.1 und als wir dann wegen eines Fehlers im Plugin in dieser Version ein Ticket eröffnet haben, heißt es plötzlich:

"das Plugin ist derzeit noch nicht für 6.4.2 freigegeben. Wir testen derzeit die Version 6.4.2.1. Ich habe den Fehler aber schon den Entwicklern weitergeleitet und hoffe das schnellst möglichst ein Update anbieten können"

Sorry, aber jeder kann sehen, dass das Plugin kompatibel gekennzeichnet ist. Das ist entweder eine dreiste Lüge um vom Fehler abzulenken oder aber Unfähigkeit, die Kompatibilität richtig zu kennzeichnen.

alles in allem eine Katastrophe. Vom telefonisch nie erreichbaren Support oder dem Support, der erst 10 Tage später auf Mails antwortet, möchte ich mal gar nicht anfangen...
comments.headline: Plugin laut Store für 6.4.2.x kompatibel, dann aber doch nicht. Service/Support mieserabel!

changelog.text:
New Features


* Added support for Shopware 6.5

* Removed support for Shopware 6.4

* General code optimizations implemented

* If you use classes and functions of the plugin in your own plugins or extend code of the plugin, you should check your

  code for functionality after the update, because some places were adjusted


Maintenance


* Tested with 6.5.1.1

* 1. run tested with 6.5.2.1

* 2. run tested with 6.5.3.0

New Features


* Added support for Shopware 6.5

* Removed support for Shopware 6.4

* General code optimizations implemented

* If you use classes and functions of the plugin in your own plugins or extend code of the plugin, you should check your

  code for functionality after the update, because some places were adjusted


Maintenance


* Tested with 6.5.1.1

* 1. run tested with 6.5.2.1

* 2. run tested with 6.5.3.0

New Features

 

  • New payment method: PAYONE Secured Invoice
  • New payment method: PAYONE Secured Installment
  • New payment method: PAYONE Secured Direct Debit
  • New payment method: PAYONE WeChat Pay
  • New payment method: PAYONE Postfinance Card
  • New payment method: PAYONE Postfinance E-Finance
  • New payment method: PAYONE AliPay
  • Opt-in for automatic capture 


Bugfixes

 

  • fixed reference problem in paydirekt
  • fixed capture problem in iDEAL
  • fixed data-type-casting in migration
  • fixed support for vouchers 


Maintenance

 

  • improve payment filter technology
  • removed birthday field from open invoice
  • update iDEAL issuer list
  • tested with 6.4.20

New Features

 

  • New payment method: Klarna Rechnung
  • New payment method: Klarna Sofort
  • New payment method: Klarna Ratenkauf
  • New payment method: P24
  • The credit card - card type is now displayed in the backend at the order details

 

Bugfixes

 

  • Fixed redirect routing when using multi-saleschannels - Thanks to @patchee500
  • Fixed Unzer B2B
  • Fixed Refund with wrong tx_id

 

Maintenance

 

  • tested with 6.4.17.1

New Features


  • Shopware 6.3 support removed 

  • General code optimizations implemented

  • Important change: The transaction data of PAYONE payments was previously always stored in the additional fields of the orders. Since the additional fields are stored as JSON in the database, searching the transaction data was not very performant for large amounts of data. Therefore, an entity extension was set up for the transaction data so that the data is stored in an extra database table that can be searched much more performantly. During the plugin update, the old additional fields are migrated to the entity extension and then the additional fields are deleted. If you have used our additional fields in your own code or for example in the synchronization to external systems, you have to adapt this to the new entity extension.


Bugfix

  •  Remove deletion of saved credit cards 


Maintenance

  • Remove BIC from debit

  • Tested with 6.4.16

New Features


- New payment method: Ratepay Open Invoice 

- New payment method: Ratepay Direct Debit

- New payment method: Ratepay Installments


Maintenance


- Integrate a sales landingpage in backend

- Tested with version 6.4.14

New Features

  • New payment method: Bancontact
  • Added bankgrouptypes for iDEAL
  • Add scheduled task to clean up redirect table
  • Add due date for invoice on standard invoice

Bugfixes

  • added shipping costs to line items
  • fixed removal of secure invoice

Maintenance

  • Changed renaming of payment methods
  • Changed PAYONE Logo
  • tested with 6.4.12

New Features

 

* New payment method: Open Invoice

* Add checkbox for credit card payments to save or remove payment data


Bugfixes

 

* remove capturemode param if completed

* update ZeroAmountCartValidator

* always set data protection check


Maintenance

* include line items with no tax for capture

* add shipping information to Unzer


Tested with:

Shopware 6.4.10.0

Bugfixes


* Customer deletion now possible

* Refund only from not yet refunded items possible

* Adjustment missing dependencies when installing via store


Maintenance


* fix compatibility 6.4.7.0

* drop support for 6.2

New Features


* Deactivate payone payment methods on zero amount carts

* Add apple-pay

* Add payment method description


Bugfixes


* Fix config loading error

* Fix storefront requests

* Fix missing service

* Fix missing customer parameter on prepayment


Maintenance


* Fix backwards compatibility

* Removed cardtype type discover

* Add dependency to GitHub pipeline

* Add fix for Version 6.4.5.0

Bugfix


* transaction status transmission of txstatus "paid" 


Maintenance


* Shopware 6.4.4.0 compatibility


Notice


* We're dropping compatibility with Shopware 6.2.* in a future release of this plugin

New Features

 

* new PAYONE permissions management

* status mapping per payment method possible

 

Bugfixes

 

* fix for unlock the buy now button

* PayPal Express: telephone number not a mandatory field 

 

Maintenance

 

* Shopware 6.4.3.1 compatibility

* massive refactoring effort

* Elasticsearch compatibility

New Features
 
* compatibility with Shopware 6.4.x
 
Bugfixes
 
* fixed API Test for paydirekt
* always provide shipping address for paypal payments
* fixed labels for PAYONE status mapping (finally!)
 
Maintenance
 
* tested with Shop version 6.4.1.0

* better error message translations

New Features
 
* new payment method: PAYONE safe invoice
* new payment method: Trustly
* added optional submission of order number in the "narrative_text" parameter. This will show the shopware order number on the customer's bank statement or payment info (depending on payment method). If left out, our internal txid is shown.
 
Bugfix(es)
 
* fixed payone_allow_refund and payone_allow_capture custom fields to better reflect the current status of an order. This can help when issuing captures and debits via third party systems
 
Maintenance
 

* tested with Shopware 6.3.4.1

New Features

  • New Payment Method: Prepayment
  • New Payment Method: Paydirekt
  • Support Cancel-Payment flow of Shopware 6.2

Bugfix(es)

  • fixed a bug where existing settings like payment method assignments could get lost after a plugin update
  • fixed wrong sales channel routing of PayPal Express Payments
  • various smaller fixes

Maintenance

  • Compatibility for Shopware 6.2.x+
  • tested with Shopware 6.3.0.2
  • We had to drop support for Shopware <6.2.0

New Features

* Partial Captures and Refunds are now possible!
* UI improvements in Settings (these are now collapsible)
* You can now choose the authorization method for every payment method!
* New payment method: iDeal
* New payment method: EPS

Bugfixes

* fixed PayPal ECS button
* fixed translation bugs during checkout
* Better feedback when verifiyng API credentials without active PAYONE payment methods
* fixed a bug that could occur when migrating from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1

Known Incompatibilities

* Backurlhandling in Shopware 6.2 is currently broken. If a customer gets redirected to their favorite payment method but decides to cancel and choose another one, no PAYONE payment methods are available. We're working on a fix to enable correct handling of this use case.

Bugfixes

* corrected encoding of response parameters during PayPal ECS
* Added missing CVC length configs for less used card types
* Fixed a bug where custom fields weren't shown in checkout when using non-default shop languages. We currently support DE and EN and plan to improve this further

Maintenance

* incorporated best practices for Shopware Code Review
First version of the PAYONE Payment integration for Shopware 6.1
